entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
